title: Hidden King

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- During the day, cause your vote to count thrice. This is not public, nor will there be any indication that it happened. You can do this one time per day.
- During the night, send your loyal guards to protect another player, granting them Powerful Defense against direct attacks.
- During the night, you may send your guards to attack another player.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You will start on a random faction. If you are a part of an evil faction, you will not be allowed to attack other players unless no one else is able to kill. Ignore this if the Hidden King is a member of the Coven.
- You may only guard yourself once.
- You may only attack twice if you are apart of the Town.

fields.name: Messages:
fields.value:
"You were attacked by the King's guard!"
"You were attacked but someone protected you!"
"The Hidden King sentenced them to death." (Always first)

desc:
Post 207
*Ousted by those you were once above, you seek to reclaim leadership. One way or another.*
Roleblock Immune
